## IAuthenticationClient.init() method

Initiates an authentication handshake.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
init(): Promise<AuthenticationData>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<AuthenticationData>`

a promise to return an [AuthenticationData](./services.authenticationdata.md) when ready to continue.
